title: Daomu Biji: Restart - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Horror   Mystery   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Drama   Artifacts   Clever Protagonist   Curious Protagonist   Friendship   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secrets
author: Nan Pai San Shu   Xu Lei   南派三叔
description: After fulfilling his ten year promise with Zhang Qiling, Wu Xie is now living in seclusion in Fujian. One day, he suddenly received a text message from his uncle, Wu Sanxing. Through various clues his uncle left behind, Wu Xie finds an ancient tomb that may be related to his uncle's past. The tomb is the legendary South Sea King's Tomb. But just as Wu Xie plans to search for it, Jin Wantang reveals his plan to his Uncle Two. After Uncle Two stops him and hears the story, he decides to join Wu Xie, Fatty, and Zhang Qiling as they search for the tomb.  >
